entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 16 January 2023
